name: nyt_archive_browser
description: Browse archived NYT articles by month.

scripts.dev: concurrently "node index.js" "npm run copy-normalize" "npm run build-css-dev" "npm run watch-copy-js"
scripts.build-production: concurrently "npm run build-css-prod" "npm run copy-js " "npm run copy-assets" "npm run copy-normalize"
scripts.build-css-prod: rimraf static/css/**/* && node-sass --output-style='compressed' --include-path sass/partials sass/*.sass static/css/main.css
